node.title: Police investigate as Toto the emu shot with an arrow
node.alt: Toto the Silverton emu with it's mouth open looking at a camera
node.description: There's a mystery unfolding near Broken Hill as the beloved emu is found withÂ an arrowhead wound.
node.content:
["Mystery surrounds an incident where a beloved emu was found to have been shot with an arrow near Broken Hill.\u00a0", "Police are searching for the person or persons responsible for attacking Silverton's resident emu 'Toto'.", "The owners of the Silverton Outback Camels, who discovered the wound, believed it was caused by an arrow.", "The bird survived and is in \"good spirits\"\u00a0according to the couple \u2013 who have labelled those responsible as \"idiots\"\u00a0for shooting the endangered species.", "\"It's bloody gutless.\"", "His partner Petah Devine said Toto had been \"a little under the weather and just not himself\"\u00a0for a couple of days before the pair discovered the arrowhead.", "", "
The couple who found the arrowhead said Toto was \"in distress\" prior to the discovery he'd been shot.\u00a0(Supplied: Petah Devine\u00a0)
", "Both say they haven't heard shooters recently and were surprised to find the wound following a closer inspection of the bird.", "\"It's\u00a0pretty good to be honest,\" Mr Pickering said.", "\"One time we had some idiots out here shooting, but that was when there was a music festival on and the police ere called and came out and actually caught the idiots.\"", "Police have confirmed they received the report \u2013 and are looking into the matter.", "Though it is unlikely the culprit will be found.", "According to New South Wales National Parks the penalty for attacking or killing an emu ranges from a fine to jail time depending on the severity \u2013 but is at\u00a0the Magistrate's discretion.\u00a0", "", "
It's not known when the emu was shot.\u00a0(Supplied: Petah Devine)
", "Duncan Pickering said he wanted to find those responsible so they can be held accountable.", "\"I'm trying to find out if there's anyone that knows anyone who's got a bow and arrow and would do this sort of thing,\" he said.", "But so far no leads", "\"If you're a child you can be forgiven, but if you're an adult you're gutless coward,\" Mr Pickering said."]
